channel.title: What crimes have you commited?
channel.description:
So, i was sitting on the bus today and started going thru my head about all the things ive done wrong.
So, whats your list of misdeeds? Heres mine.
Speeding Reckless Driving Street Racing Attempted Murder Sex with a minor Theft Grand Larsony Rape Drug Trafficking Supplying alcohol to a minor
So, what have you done

item.title: What crimes have you commited?
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

[quote=“Tree, post:145, topic:256615”][quote author=ThAt0n36Uy link=topic=338933.msg2685291#msg2685291 date=1235621935]

Been ridiculously high off my ass. But right now I’m gonna puke from these pain killers. Fuck meee.

I call bullshit.
[/quote]

Really? What’s bullshit’s number?[/quote]
That was a bit dry.

Read full topic

item.title: What crimes have you commited?
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

House, i am sick as a dog and it was like 4am, well anyways, yea, I was, Not one thing ive ever said on these forums is a lie. And eh…“Nice to know we are amongst murderers, rapists and arsonists.” i never saw those last two, never done either of those either. Im awesome with fire, but never burnt any one else shit just my own.

Read full topic

item.title: What crimes have you commited?
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

Hiaburi:

Kinda funny, ive got like every one posted here under my belt and most think im a good… think i was*… a good kid(still not out of the habit of calling my self a kid, almost 20.) Accept the attempted murder one people keep putting. Ive been caught about… 2 or so times, but got away. Ive been in trouble with the law 4 times so far. Assault, threatening to hurt some one, rolled through a stop sign at 5mph in the middle of a giant open field making a right turn “You could have killed some one!” and once when i was like 8 or so i broke into some peoples hows while they were gone and cleaned it completely out after eating their food and chillin on their couch, land lord saw me walking away with the tv through a field.

What is a hows?

And also, if thats true, your were one bad ass 8year old

Read full topic

item.title: What crimes have you commited?
item.dc:creator: @Not_X_A_Alex Not X A Alex
item.description:
@Not_X_A_Alex wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:126, topic:256615”][quote author=cooper link=topic=338933.msg2679475#msg2679475 date=1235275744]

I’m only 14, but this is what I’ve caused:

Same night:
-After curfew
-Trespassing
-Whatever you do when you make loud noise in the streets
-Loitering
-Running from the cops

Other:
-T-P’n
-Running from the cops
-Attempted murder
-Throwing pumpkins at a house
-Shining lasers in people eyes
-Lighting fireworks where cars drive alot.
-Alot of other junk.

Not a crime, just stupid.
[/quote]
You make make people blind/hurt their eyes by doing that, so its an attempt to make someone blind.[/quote]
no its just stupid

Read full topic
